original_title: The Wildest Show in the South: The Angola Prison Rodeo
overview: The Wildest Show in the South: The Angola Prison Rodeo is a 1999 American short documentary film directed by Simeon Soffer. It focuses primarily on the inmates experiences in the rodeo. For a lot of those prisoners, the rodeo seems to be the only thing they have to look forward to. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.
title: The Wildest Show in the South: The Angola Prison Rodeo
